info.info: Returns an object with the current configuration that Buffer is using, including supported services, their icons and the varying limits of character and schedules.

link.shares: Returns an object with a the numbers of shares a link has had using Buffer.

profile.list: Returns an array of social media profiles connected to a users account.
profile.get: Returns details of the single specified social media profile.

schedule.list: Returns details of the posting schedules associated with a social media profile.
schedule.update: Set the posting schedules for the specified social media profile.

update.get: Returns a single social media update.
update.pending: Returns an array of updates that are currently in the buffer for an individual social media profile.
update.sent: Returns an array of updates that have been sent from the buffer for an individual social media profile.
update.interactions: Returns the detailed information on individual interactions with the social media update such as favorites, retweets and likes.
update.reorder: Edit the order at which statuses for the specified social media profile will be sent out of the buffer.
update.shuffle: Randomize the order at which statuses for the specified social media profile will be sent out of the buffer.
update.create: Create one or more new status updates.
update.update: Edit an existing, individual status update.
update.share: Immediately shares a single pending update and recalculates times for updates remaining in the queue.
update.destroy: Permanently delete an existing status update.
update.top: Move an existing status update to the top of the queue and recalculate times for all updates in the queue. Returns the update with its new posting time.
